title: Zadicar1
author: Zadicar1
content: Good day!Just want to request for some ban appeal of my account Zadicarhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=663136Its been already 4+ years of the said ban.I didnt get any response in regarding on my appeal on the given email stated in the account.Hope i would be given a chance on accessing this account once again.Im not sure on what are the violations had made out back in the past but i would be asking for someforgiveness and would really be truly changing up.Please do give me a chance.

comments.author: DVlog
comments.body: There is a list of violations that you have done in the past I can see. Spamming, using multiple id. It's been a long time and i think you have tried to unban your account before without any success. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5202665.msg53124953#msg53124953https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1763030.msg17621030#msg17621030

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: I don't think Ban Appeal is usually given much of an option when you contact them through mail; it has been proven multiple times here on the forum, and it's also clearly stated on the message that your chances are very little.Back to the reason why your account was banned in the first place, I believe it might have something to do with this.  Account farming. Allowed?  I did a quick search on your profile, and that was among the few negative reports I found for your account. I don't know how true it might be, but I guess it might have something to do with why your account was banned, or maybe you made a mistake of plagiarism in the past, which might also be another cost of such a ban action.
